category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_QRY_suppress_inactive_user
preference.preference_description: Suppresses the visibility of inactive users in queries. Valid Values: * 0: Users can see both active and inactive users in user LOV for query. * 1: Users cannot see the inactive users in user LOV for query. This is the default value.
